title: Luis Barrufa
text: Luis Barrufa (born 11 February 1946) is a former Uruguayan <a href="cycle%20sport">cyclist</a>. He competed in the <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%201000m%20time%20trial">1000m time trial</a> at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>.
